website_summaries.verdict: An excellent dry hair formula by John Frieda, and one that works well for most consumers with fine, thin hair.
pros: Earns praise for making hair look fuller and feel softer, and for making hair more manageable to style
Great results reported on very thin hair
cons: May make your hair a bit oily if you are already prone to oily hair

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find my favorite shampoo at Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this shampoo for a long time. I have fine straight hair, and this shampoo really does help add volume - it's the best volumizing shampoo I've ever found. Hint: as most shampoos do, the tube says to wash, rinse and then repeat. I've found it works even better when there are three wash/rinses. Also, I didn't give stars for moisturizing since that's not the purpose of the shampoo, but I also want to note that it doesn't leave the hair dry either.
customer_reviews.author: ADA

customer_reviews.title: Better than L’Oreal IMHO
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, straight, flat hair and the John Frieda Luxurious Volume combo of shampoo plus the coordinating conditioner really give me more body than any other shampoo/conditioners I tried. I used to use L’Oreal Volume Pump, but I think this John Frieda is better. My ends also curl a little more when they dry. My hair looks and feels soft, glossy, and almost fluffy. Like a Disney princess. Not limp, like a Disney wicked stepsister. Major improvement.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I read alot of reviews before purchasing this product and thought I was going to find the right shampoo for my hair type finally... I have thin, on the dry side, frizzy hair and have always struggled to find the perfect shampoo... this shampoo amke my hair feel more dry and with a "straw" feeling. Will no be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this, as my hair has always been kind of flat/fine, and I welcome as much volume as I can to it. I've tried the shampoo and conditioner out together a few times now since buying and unfortunately it seems like my hair is somehow even flatter. Both products, to me, didn't smell like anything, so nothing exciting there. My hair has been silky smooth, which can be nice, but with my hair doesn't really work. Made my hair feel thin. Hair type: Thin, dark brown, naturally wavy, not color treated. Long and can get oily quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sel

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on its promise
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this shampoo for three weeks and I have noticed my hair is fuller. It also feels soft. I don’t brush my hair after it is dry because this shampoo has also brought out the natural curl in my hair. I will continue to use it. I also bought the conditioner. I don’t know whether the conditioner is complementing the shampoo but it doesn’t detangle my hair well. I will most likely switch to a different conditioner for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Martin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have short, fine hair. The volumizing shampoo I’ve used for years was discontinued so I tried this one. It doesn’t dry out my hair, it definitely adds column and it doesn’t weigh my hair down. I would add though that you definitely need a conditioner in conjunction with this product as the volumizing qualities tend to make my hair harder to style. As long as I use my regular conditioner with it, I’m good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product for fine hair! Leaves hair smooth with no residue & is most affordable product that works for easily tangled hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love all the products by John Freida. This is the only thing I’ve found for my fine hair that works to detangle, prevent breakage, & keeps it smooth without excess waxy residue. My hair is extremely hard to manage (fine hair that tangles very bad the second it gets wet) & I’ve never been able to find anything that helped until this! I made the mistake of trying a new product because I had been using this for many years, and instantly regretted it so I bought a bunch more JF products to restock for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K.

customer_reviews.title: Good help for those of use hair challenged folks.
customer_reviews.text: OK, so my hair is falling out and I'm too vain to go down without a fight. Yes I take the pills but I need everything bit of help I can get. I also use the 7 day volume in shower treatment. Used together you don't see big gaps in my hair as before.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Volumizing!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a volumizing shampoo since my hair was seeming to shed. I’ve tried several. I enjoy the scent of this one. Because it’s volumizing, it gently strips old product off of my hair. Where there may be build-up. I love the smell and it totally holds well to its name. My hair is bouncy and full. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: CPM North Ga

customer_reviews.title: Gluten/wheat in product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has wheat in it, as I discovered after my whole scalp broke out in acne after using it. If you are reactive to wheat or gluten, do not use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moothart

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 5 stars but...
customer_reviews.text: I have straight hair and am always looking for a product that will boost my tossed cut style. This product does give my hair some volume but, at the cost of leaving an odd rough feeling residue in my hair. I would give it a 5 for the fact it does add volume nicely but, I am not happy with the residue it leaves behind for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find a shampoo that gives my thin, flat hair volume, and this is the best I've found. It absolutely does give my hair volume. There is no apparent scent, which is great; why use scented soap and shampoo and then put on perfume that doesn't match anyway. I'm totally sold on this John Frieda shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: PA female

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for fine hair. No extra weight while delivering soft, smooth, well conditioned hair. I love this shampoo and conditioner so much that I order it online in bulk as none of my local stores carry it. I can’t keep it away from my teenage daughter either.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and I am always looking for products that will give my hair some volume or body. I have used other John Frieda products and liked them, so I thought I would try Luxurious Volume. While it is a nice, creamy shampoo, it did not add any noticeable volume to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyK

customer_reviews.title: VOLUME, SHINE, NOURISHED SCALP
customer_reviews.text: Fast results! Great volume for my baby fine hair. I am very sensitive to many products, so I am quite pleased to say no strong scent, rinses easily, no scalp irritation. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Shanks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo so far
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine thin hair, and this is the only (affordable) shampoo Ive found for my hair type. I also have a sensitive scalp, and this doesn’t cause any itching or irritation. It has very little fragrance and is clear, the fragrances are usually what irritates your scalp, so I like how they only put a little bit. I feel like my hair DOES have a little more volume. I use the matching conditioner, however it seems very similar to all the other JF conditioners. So I doubt that they HAVE to be used together.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Increasing the thickness of my hair volume
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing! It increases the thickness of my hair volume, makes my hair style manageable. The scent is pleasant, not too strong. My hair looks shiny after using this product. I really fall in love with this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous John Frida products!
customer_reviews.text: I repeatedly order and use John Frieda hair products for their great results! My hair is soft and more full from use of these products.
customer_reviews.author: mimscase

customer_reviews.title: Fine hair fixer.
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine limp hair and this is the best product I have ever used. I shampoo twice, towel dry, use a tiny bit of setting gel and dry with a curling brush. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Brink

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Tried this brand - I usually use Paul Mitchell - your shampoo does not even compare to Paul Mitchell -throwing it in the trash. False advertising. Please refund my $
customer_reviews.author: John Plumadore

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: It moisturizes my hair without leaving it flat and I bought the mousse which in combination works well. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE G.

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's name
customer_reviews.text: Gives my fine, thin hair some much needed volume. The scent is mild and leaves my hair soft but not fly away. This is my first time using it and will gladly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: doverma

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years something is a miss, did they change something in the ingredients?
customer_reviews.author: Tammyc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shampoo that makes my hair feel fresh and light, highly recommend. I've tried the salon brands that are pricey and none of them make my hair feel voluminous like this one. Plus, you can't beat the price on here!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sulkowski

customer_reviews.title: John Frieda
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Used to buy it at Target but they stopped carrying it. Glad you have it in stock.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Smells like some good hotel shampoo but not the best not even top10 + makes my hair dry and frizzy ...
customer_reviews.text: This product smells like some pretty good hotel shampoo. Unfortunately when applying the conditioner it actually foamed up like shampoo, maybe it was to give volume. On that note the thickness of my hair did not change but this product does dry my hair out leaving it brighter and with more frizz (volume). I do not plan to use this product again because it is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA

customer_reviews.title: Clean Hair, Healthy Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! My hair feels super clean and less greasy with no friz!
customer_reviews.author: EmW

customer_reviews.title: Smells yummy! Adds moisture but, not volume.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. I didn't find that it added volume. I switched back to my other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Holmes

customer_reviews.title: For volume? Not so sure!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of online reviews saying that this is great for volume. My wife used it on her hair and nothing. It was flat as ever. Aussie Aussome Volume Shampoo gives 10 times more volume than this and is cheaper too. Won't be buying it again for sure. I put one star because it won't let me put zero stars. Please if you are buying for volume its a complete waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love the shampoo. Needs to be packaged better. Shampoo on the inside of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Event Planner

customer_reviews.title: my favorite shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo seems to be the best for my very fine hair. it does not weight it down with conditioner but yet doesn't make it fly around even in very dry air.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Shiny hair. Does not cause tangles.
customer_reviews.text: I have long straight hair. This isn’t a miracle volume booster but my hair is shiny with some extra body. Gentle on the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Works for volume!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is incredible for volume. I can tell the difference immediately between this and my other goto shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Lena M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hate that you can’t get this in stores anymore, but glad I found it online. Works good, cleans good, must have.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is like golden silk after using this product 😍
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Product makes effort for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I had much higher hopes for a product I thought would help with volume for thinner baby fine hair at an affordable price.. This product was certainly not the worst but fell short. For this price point, it does make an effort.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGirl

customer_reviews.title: This works great for my hair and I'll stick with it until that 'miracle' comes along !
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, lifeless, dull, hair. It's hard for me to find a good product for a decent price. This works good for me and smells quite pleasant without being overly stinky. Nothing can perform a miracle for hair a person won't ever have but this keeps my boring lack of hair from a daily 'bad-hair' issue. Recommended. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin , fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have baby fine, thin hair. I wear a pixie cut to help. This shampoo is very good. Makes my hair feel fuller and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Clement

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Greasy
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and this shampoo and the conditioner that goes with it weighs it down and makes it totally greasy. It definitely is not a good volumizing shampoo. It does the complete opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Kate L

customer_reviews.title: Silky hair
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really add volume but makes the hair nice and silky!
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: I am still looking for a good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Not like I thought. Reviews were good but I disagree, disappointing
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Completely love it
customer_reviews.text: Long been looking for a shampoo with these results on short bob, colored blonde hair.
customer_reviews.author: DGM active MI shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to be able to give an honest review but when I received my order the lid had come off and there was shampoo all over the inside of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling and works
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells wonderful and creates soft volume. It is best for non-colortreated hair. I switch it up with another brand of shampoo on occasion. It really does the job without adding an heaviness to the hair follicles. My hair feels bouncy and light but has considerable volume and softness. I will definitely purchase this again. Also excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Douglas

customer_reviews.title: The best product for my hair .
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hair care mostly for volume and To keep off humidity and I got just what I Was looking for pleasantly satisfied the description is to the tee. My hair has never Felt so good , bouncy, silky and manageable. I am a very satisfied customer. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Scott

customer_reviews.title: NICE SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: This works well on my very fine, short, 'old lady' hair. I have ordered it several times. It does not strip my hair and leave it as lifeless as some shampoos do.
customer_reviews.author: granny70

customer_reviews.title: volume
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. Just using this shampoo and my hair feels soft and definitely shows some more volume than other brands I have used. Thinking of purchasing the conditioner also.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light but haven't noticed much difference in Volume sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, thin hair. This is absolutely the best product line I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, fine hair. This shampoo actually boosts volume and helps my style hold shape all day. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: M Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Touchably Full Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have had baby fine hair my whole life, and now that I'm getting older it is thinning, as well. I think I've tried just about every volumizing products, both low-end and high-end, and everything in between, and have been disappointed or should have been until I tried this John Frieda shampoo! My hairdresser recommended it after she saw what it did for one of her customers who has hair like mine. Part way through my shampoo, I kept wondering where all this hair was coming from. Seriously! Using the complementary conditioner did not make my hair go flat like other conditioners. I found my new shampoo and conditioner!
customer_reviews.author: kaykay4

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love this product for our baby fine hair. We use it daily and it cleanses and controls the oil that tends to accumulate on our scalps, while not weighing our hair down.
customer_reviews.author: SFO

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo great, but not this time!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shampoo but it was not wrapped and opened during shipping spilling out into the box. Very disappointed in how it was packed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it gives my hair subtle volume without ...
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this! I love the way it gives my hair subtle volume without looking like a Pomeranian. Smells good to
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne E.

customer_reviews.title: Best Volume Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Way better than any salon product. I have long hair that is very heavy, but this shampoo gives my hair a boost. It feels weightless and I've retired my teasing comb since purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Been using this shampoo for many years. This is great value, cheaper than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: shadow

customer_reviews.title: Dried out hair causing breakage
customer_reviews.text: Dried my hair out terribly which caused breakage. Discontinued use.
customer_reviews.author: S. F.

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my very thick, fast-growing hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to shampoo my hair for at least 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: devi7b

customer_reviews.title: Chock full of chemicals, silicons- Caused SO much hair-fall in the bath!
customer_reviews.text: It's very, very harsh. As an experiment, I used another shampoo after a few days and had ABSOLUTELY NO hair fall in the bath. I was then sure that it was THIS shampoo. Do yourself a favor- read the ingredient list, it'll be enough to turn you off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trust J. Frieda!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and use the shampoo and conditioner together. Rich feel, generous supply in tube. Hair looks fuller and softer. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: christopher j. smith

customer_reviews.title: its OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few volume enhancing shampoos to compare. John Frieda is usually very good. However, this shampoo was a disappointment. It did not provide volume like the other products I tried. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of doing what it says it will do. Great lift for flat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Neff

customer_reviews.title: like it, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: With any thickener, you get a coarser feel to your hair. I also get allergic to it. So far it doesn't feel to coarse, and my head tolerates it. I get a much nicer hairdo which lasts without hairspray..( also allergic) So I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shampoo for fine hair; gives great volume & leaves hair soft & shiny. LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: BFox

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Have been using it for many years ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have been using it for many years now and hope to be able to continue using it for many more.
customer_reviews.author: DLL

customer_reviews.title: Thin, fine hair happy again*****
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, tube is convenient, ascent is simple, does NOT weigh down, not drying.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Fekkai
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with how much body and volume this shampoo ( and conditioner) give my very fine hair. The best result is when using them both together. Before this, no other volumizing shampoo gave the same results as Fekkai. But I can't justify spending nearly 60 bucks on 2 bottles of hair product when something equally good costs 10 bucks or less. Yes, Fekkai smells great, but that alone does not make me want to spend all that extra money. (If you want sexy smelling hair, spritz a bit ( not a lot) of your perfume on wet hair, comb through, and blow dry or not. The resulting fragrance is nice and subtle.)
customer_reviews.author: Sarabeesmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fine limp hair
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to give my fine hair the volume it needs and it last for two days
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful... I used this product with the shampoo and the next day my coworker noticed my hair had volume. This is my new shampoo/conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Product adds volume to hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years when shampooing my hair, and it actually does add volume.
customer_reviews.author: TeriB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and was looking for a shampoo that would give me that poof. Not this one. Regular shampoo works better
customer_reviews.author: Anne Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my hair type.
customer_reviews.text: Not every shampoo is for every hair type. This one just did not work well on my hair type. I have very fine and thin hair. I am Asian and sometimes that type of hair is different from other cultures. This shampoo and conditioner made my hair "silky smooth" but did not add more volume as my old volumizer shampoo. Actual, my hair was much flatter with J. Frieda. Also, I found my scalp to be very itchy. I discontinued using it, but again, it has to do with hair type and the itchiness could have to do with body chemistry.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over the package.
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo bottle was open and leaked all over the bad and box! Better packaging is a must for any liquid products.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Gives my fine hair great body
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have fine hair and this gives my hair great body. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: fc

customer_reviews.title: John Frieda's the best.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is much fuller looking and silkier after using the shampoo. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Beware of silicone
customer_reviews.text: Silicone is a no no for my hair. Wish I had read the label.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Have used over a year.... for color treated hair... gentle and leaves hair full of Volume.. Very soft.
customer_reviews.author: R. Payne

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Was sadly disappointed in this product. Expensive but hardly voluminous hair.won't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: social work lady

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Suave works just as good as this product if you're looking for volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Shampoo I use
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shampoo I use. It does not make my head itch as most shampoos do.
customer_reviews.author: Fiction lover

customer_reviews.title: flattening
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo made my hair totally dry and flat. I could only use it twice.... I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: VBWilk

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Just like the conditioner, it was not like other John Frieda products I have ordered before. Won't be ordering this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans hair fine, but zero volume added
customer_reviews.text: I have medium-length, fine, blonde, naturally-wavy, thinning hair. I am on the hunt for volumizing products. I was hoping this shampoo would be one of them, based on some favourable reviews. I was disappointed. It cleans the hair fine, does not seem to strip it, doesn't have the type of harsh ingredients that over-dry or make your scalp feel bad. But it does not provide any volume at all. And since that's how it's being marketed, I give it a fail. I will not buy again, and the search continues.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once or twice but so far it's pretty good. I was using Flat to Volume by Pantene but I think it was drying my hair out
customer_reviews.author: P. Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shampoo. It really thickens my fine hair. It smells great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Meruvia

customer_reviews.title: Good!!
customer_reviews.text: So far/so good! I am using both this shampoo and John Frieda volume for after shampoo. Working and looking good!
customer_reviews.author: Clpoorman

customer_reviews.title: shampoo
customer_reviews.text: not a lot of difference but some volume added good lather and cleaning also i would recommend this shampoo to all
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner really does cause your hair to look thicker. Since it makes my hair look fuller I do not have to shampoo as often!
customer_reviews.author: BMCK

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: For me didn't really make a difference in my thin hair. I was hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: PegK

customer_reviews.title: fine to thick
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and this shampoo makes it feel and look thicker. It smells great too. I recommend it to people with fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I will buy it again, it makes your hair really full, excellent product, I recommend it, I will try other products from Frieda
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair feel clean, soft and silky. I have very fine blonde hair, and this makes it shiny and full!
customer_reviews.author: T. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo. The smell is great and I feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. The smell is great and I feel very clean after using it. I use it every day and it keeps my hair healthy and full.
customer_reviews.author: ZNates

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but leaking tube. Shame on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Product works wonderful. Came with the entire end opened up and product leaking all over box.
customer_reviews.author: SSM

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any added volume on my fine hair
customer_reviews.author: lovetobake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for thin hair!
customer_reviews.text: I've been cursed with fine hair my whole life and struggled with the flatness for too long so I decided to try this out. I am amazed by the difference this is compared to the other shampoo products I've tried. This is just as good if not better than those 16 dollar shampoos. My hair now feels shinier and fuller than ever before. I recommend combining this with the conditioner for the best results. It gives hair that extra oomph!
customer_reviews.author: Oceanrabbits

customer_reviews.title: This crap
customer_reviews.text: This crap doesnt get hair clean. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: A great product! After using it the hair is lush and soft! And do not require styling!
customer_reviews.author: erikkaraganda

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo revitalizes hair and restores body......love it!!!! Jon Frieda line of hair care products are exceptional. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: wildcatfan1313

customer_reviews.title: Good but smelly
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it said it would do - my hair really did look and feel fuller and thicker. But, the heavy perfume smell coming off my hair was SO strong that I had a headache less than an hour after using it. Because of that I only used it once then I gave it away. I was sorry to have to give it away but I couldn't endure a daily migraine for thick full hair. If they had a fragrance free version I'd try it again. If you don't mind strong perfume smells (and many people don't mind) then you would probably find this to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

product_meta.title: John Frieda Volume Lift Touchably Full Shampoo, 8.45 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Description

Thick, full hair starts in the shower. John Frieda Luxurious Volume Touchably Full Shampoo prepares hair for voluminous style by gently cleansing without stripping. Formulated with Caffeine Vitality Complex to add fullness and soften hair, it increases volume up to 40% when used in combination with John Frieda Luxurious Volume Touchably Full Conditioner and John Frieda Luxurious Volume Root Booster Blow Dry Lotion. It’s gentle enough for everyday use and safe for colour-treated hair. For maximum volume, blow dry hair after use.

How to Use John Frieda Luxurious Volume Touchably Full Shampoo for Fine Hair:

Gently massage into wet hair and rinse well. Follow with John Frieda Luxurious Volume Touchably Full Conditioner for best results.

About John Frieda

Over three decades ago, the John Frieda brand started with the opening of a salon on New Cavendish Street, London. Today, the vision of the brand reflects that salon heritage: delivering products that target specific style problems and transform them. For salon-caliber results you can see and feel.

We learned that to get there, the solution has to be tailored to your hair’s specific needs. So we made it our mission to crack the differences behind exactly what makes blondes brighter, brunettes shine, and frizz an ancient memory. Our products are fueled by an understanding of what makes each individual hair type unique. To help your style meet its perfect match.
feature_bullets: FOR FINE OR FLAT HAIR - John Frieda Volume Lift Shampoo, with Air-Silk technology, enhances fullness.
ENHANCES VOLUME IN 1 USE - Maximize the fullness of your hair with Volume Lift full style hair preparation.
FOR COLOUR-TREATED HAIR - Safe to use on colour-treated hair to fight limp hair.
SOFTENS HAIR - Volumizing shampoo leaves hair soft with touchable movement and bounce.
NEW PACKAGING - Presenting the new volumizing formula - formerly Luxurious Volume.
Apply shampoo to wet hair, lather, rinse well. Follow with Luxurious Volume Touchably Full Conditioner
Shampoo and condition with Luxurious Volume Touchably Full Shampoo and Conditioner to thicken strands. The formula is gentle enough for daily use
